name: Modeling and Fabrication in Design
description: An introduction to the theories and technologies of modeling. The emphasis of the course will be on the exploration of the relationship between technology and design conceptualization with the aim of developing skills to construct techniques for effective visual communication. The course will be delivered through a series of lectures and workshops.
division: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
department: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
